caption.p:
Modelled climate suitability of Bemisia tabaci s.l. across the study area in East Africa under a composite scenario of natural rainfall and irrigation (Kriticos et al.
64 ). The climate data is the CM30 1995H V2 dataset
65 . Pandemic fronts digitised from Legg, et al.
28 . Map produced using ArcMap 10.6 (ESRI, Redlands, Ca., esri.com).
